name: Increased_Damage
display_help: Increases damage by 20%%.

name: Fault
display_help: This powerful stomp can cause a seismic disturbance. This will crack the Earth itself and send a Fault towards a targeted foe, throwing him and nearby enemies into the air and possibly Disorienting them. Fault deals no damage on its own.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

messages.display_attacker_hit: You Stun {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} Stuns you with their {PowerName}.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You Stun {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} Stuns you with their {PowerName}.

name: Seismic_Smash
display_help: This massive attack hits with all the force of the Earth itself. It deals tremendous amounts of damage, and may Immobilize the target if they are not defeated outright. Damage: Extreme
display_target_help: You have been immobilized by the crushing earth.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You Hold {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} Holds you with their {PowerName}.

name: Earths_Embrace
display_help: Self +HP, Res(Toxic)

name: Animate_Stone
display_help: Earth and stone coalesce to form an incredibly tough entity that can attack your foes. The Animated Stone is not alive and is immune to Psionic damage. It is also virtually immune to Sleep, Immobilize, Disorient, and Hold effects. The entity will follow you for quite a while, and can be healed and buffed like any teammate.

name: Stump_Toss
display_help: You are able to tear up a chunk of ground beneath your feet and Hurl it at an enemy. This attack is deals moderate damage, and can knock foes back and even drop them out of the air if they are flying. Damage: Moderate
display_target_help: You have been hit by a piece of tree and cannot fly.

name: Quicksand
display_help: You can cause the ground to liquefy like Quicksand at a targeted location. Any foes that pass through the Quicksand will become snared, and their movement will be dramatically Slowed. Foes trapped in the Quicksand cannot jump or Fly. Recharge: Slow
display_target_help: Your Running speed and Jump height are reduced by the Quicksand.
